cast.name: 大卫·J·考克 David J. Cork
瑞安·切尔旺科 Ryan Czerwonko
萨姆·恩卡纳西翁 Sam Encarnacion

introduction: Lucy and Lucien are two childhood friends who share a deeply troubled past, but they've managed to carve out a life for themselves in New York City. Lucy is an actor about to make her Off-Broadway debut, and Lucien's vying for a solo show at a prestigious art gallery. But when their cousin Matt inexplicably appears, dredging up painful shared history, Lucy and Lucien both struggle to maintain their sanity and sobriety. As their breakout moment arrives, both are forced to grapple with a legacy of childhood trauma, addiction, and loss. They must rely on their chosen family of artists and sex workers to help bring them through.
